Searing Heat.name: Legendary Node
Searing Heat.title: Searing Heat
Searing Heat.description: Pyromancy skills have a +12% increased Critical Strike Chance and deal increased Direct damage equal to 20% of your Damage with Fire bonus, up to x60%.

Frigid Fate.name: Legendary Node
Frigid Fate.title: Frigid Fate
Frigid Fate.description: You deal bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies equal to x20% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Cold, up to a maximum of x60%.

Static Surge.name: Legendary Node
Static Surge.title: Static Surge
Static Surge.description: After spending 100 Mana, your next cast of Chain Lightning or Charged Bolts makes enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds and restores 10% of your Mana. This Mana cost requirement is reduced by Mana Cost Reduction bonuses.

Elemental Summoner.name: Legendary Node
Elemental Summoner.title: Elemental Summoner
Elemental Summoner.description: Your Conjuration Skills have x10% reduced Cooldown or Mana cost. They also deal bonus damage equal to x10% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Fire, Lightning, and Cold, up to x60%.

Burning Instinct.name: Legendary Node
Burning Instinct.title: Burning Instinct
Burning Instinct.description: Your Burning damage is increased by x10% of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus, plus x2% for every 30 Intelligence you have, up to x90%.

Icefall.name: Legendary Node
Icefall.title: Icefall
Icefall.description: Your Frost skills deal x25% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies. This bonus is doubled if the enemy is also Frozen.

Ceaseless Conduit.name: Legendary Node
Ceaseless Conduit.title: Ceaseless Conduit
Ceaseless Conduit.description: Crackling Energy has a 25% chance to not consume a Charge when triggered. Crackling Energy's damage is increased by x2% per 25 total Intelligence you have, up to x120%.

Fundamental Release.name: Legendary Node
Fundamental Release.title: Fundamental Release
Fundamental Release.description: Each time you apply Vulnerable, Burning, or Critically Strike an enemy, they take x10% increased damage from you, up to x30%.
